1.1.name: wordpress/bob-marley-quotes
1.1.description: This is a plug-in based on the Hello Dolly plug-in that comes as a default with Wordpress. I liked the idea of that so much, I figured that the inspiring words of Bob Marley would be a cool alternative. When activated you will randomly see a lyric from Bob Marley's archive in the upper right of your admin screen on every page.
